Name: businessEntityId
Description: The value of this attribute must match the id input into the subprocess in the first step.

Name: chunkSize
Description: Integer value to size of cases that will be loaded when scroll down.

Name: scrollHeight
Description: Integer value to configure the height of the list.

Name: emptyMessage
Description: The message will be displayed if there are no cases.

Name: showCasesOfOwner
Description: Boolean value to specify the displaying cases of owner, when set to true cases of owner will be displayed.
